text: making your own yogurt is not nearly as
complicated as it may seem in fact it's
quite simple and it only takes about 20
minutes of hands-on time so start with
one quart of milk and I think this is a
really great case to stop by the farmers
market and grab that really fresh
organic milk because the products you
start with are what's going to influence
your final yogurt so I'm heating this
over about medium heat and I'm looking
to get it just below boiling so 180
degrees we're already up to about 130
degrees just make sure you whisk from
time to time to make sure nothing is
scorching on the bottom this should come
up to temperature in about five minutes
we're up to 180 just turn off the heat
and I'm going to whisk one cup of this
heated milk with three tablespoons of
yogurt and it's the yogurt here the
microorganisms in the yogurt that's
going to help turn our heated milk into
more yogurt I find that 2% milk or full
fat milk works a lot better for this and
definitely use plain yogurt you don't
want to use any flavored yogurts here
okay so my yogurt and milk are nice and
combined now transfer it to a clean jar
that's good so this is going to hang out
for about 4 or 5 hours until it becomes
the consistency of a thick custard in
order to keep the temperature around 110
degrees wrap it with a couple of clean
kitchen towels make sure it's nice and
snug
don't put the lid on but do cover the
top with a loose towel so we'll just put
this aside on the counter and let that
thicken alright it's been about five
hours let's unwrap the sky ooh this
looks great it's thickened the
consistency is like custard looks
amazing we're almost there I'm just
going to chill this for about half an
hour until it's cool and then I'll be
ready to eat okay nice and chilled ready
to be enjoyed looks great a little stir
beautiful consistency
so if you wanted a thicker consistency
you could strain this in a fine mesh
sieve with cheesecloth to create
greek-style yogurt or you can just enjoy
it like this at a couple of blueberries
gorgeous all right let's try mmm so
creamy yogurt is such a healthy
convenient staple to keep on hand in
your fridge for snacking anytime
you
